commits.commit_title:
Introduce builder for Symbolizer creation

Introduce a builder for creation of Symbolizer objects. Enable all
features by default. Adjust the C API to use an opts struct. Remove all
the existing feature types and logic.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>

Rename blazesym -> blaze_symbolizer in C API

Rename blazesym to blaze_symbolizer in the C API. That is done for
consistency with the rest of the recently introduced inspector and
normalizer APIs.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>

Stop renaming function arguments in C header

It's unclear why we'd ever opt to use "gecko case" style renaming of
function arguments. Just leave them be.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>

Map usize to size_t

It looks weird to see size values in C definitions have type uintptr_t.
Map them to size_t instead for good measure.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>
added_functions:
struct blazesym *blazesym_new_opts(const struct blazesym_feature *aFeatures,
                                   size_t aNfeatures);

commits.commit_title:
Remove unnecessary indirection in blazesym C type

The blazesym type is heap allocated and all it contains is a heap
allocated pointer. Stop this wasteful and unnecessary complex practice
by removing the indirection.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>

Check in generated C header file

With this change we check in the generated C header for the library.
This will make it easier to consume it from user code. Subsequent
changes will ensure that it is always kept up-to-date.

Signed-off-by: Daniel M眉ller <deso@posteo.net>
added_functions:
struct blazesym *blazesym_new_opts(const struct blazesym_feature *aFeatures,
                                   uintptr_t aNfeatures);

commits.commit_title:
Introduce builder for Symbolizer creation

Introduce a builder for creation of Symbolizer objects. Enable all

the existing feature types and logic.
